main event: A pilot reported observing a bright light descending slowly in the Pacific Ocean on July 26, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright light that the pilot observed through a telescope and with the naked eye., The light varied in altitude from very high to very low and was seen descending very slowly., The pilot detected no sound from the object during the observation., The sighting lasted for 30 minutes in total., The report indicates there were no identifiable aircraft in the vicinity.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: a pilot who observed the object
